#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int rev(int a) {
    int reva=0;
    while(a) {
        reva=reva*10+a%10;
        a/=10;
    }
    return reva;
}

int main() {
    int test;
    scanf("%d", &test);
    while(test--) {
        int a, b;
        scanf("%d %d", &a, &b);
        a=rev(a);
        b=rev(b);
        a=a+b;
        a=rev(a);
        printf("%d\n", a);
    }
}
